title: About Moosh
intro: We started Moosh Coffee with one mission — to bring people together through exceptional coffee and atmosphere.

sections.heading: Our Story
sections.body: Moosh Coffee Co. was founded by a small team of passionate baristas and dreamers in Cheltenham. We believe coffee should be an experience — not just a drink.

sections.heading: Our Beans
sections.body: We proudly brew Clifton Coffee, roasted locally with precision and care to create the perfect espresso for every cup.
